title: Tesla Stock Soars as Earnings Blow Through Estimates
text:
Tesla demonstrated its ability to turn a profit on its vehicles in the third quarter, sending its stock soaring 18% higher in after-hours trading. Despite being forecast to lose money in the period and missing estimates on sales, the electric-car maker managed to swing to a large profit.

Tesla stock (ticker: TSLA) has been on a roll recently—up 21% since late August—but it remained down for the year through Wednesday’s close. It had dropped 23.5% in 2019, to $254.68, while the S&P 500 had returned 21.5% including dividends....
description: In the third quarter reported Wednesday, Tesla said it earned an adjusted $342 million, or $1.91 per share—far ahead of analysts’ consensus of a loss of 46 cents.
